ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to create legends simple multi-series charts in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a simple line chart with a chart legend. The Legend is created as follows:
- Adding a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.ChartModifiers.LegendModifier.html']LegendModifier Type[/url] to the SciChartSurface.ChartModifier. This aggregates and exposes series data which you can bind to. - Adding a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v4.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.SciChartLegend.html']SciChartLegend[/url] to the chart, binding it to LegendModifier.LegendData.SeriesInfo.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
There are many different configurations for the legend, including auto-creation of legend, or fine grained control over the legend rows. Please review the API documentation below carefully for further informatino.
